column4: Exclusive: Saudi Arabia's PIF has shown no interest in bankrolling Tesla buyout - sources
column5: DUBAI/RIYADH/LONDON Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF) has shown no interest so far in financing Tesla Inc  CEO Elon Musk's proposed $72 billion deal to take the U.S. electric car maker private  despite acquiring a minority stake in the company this year  two sources familiar with the matter said.
